requiredMoves.moveName: Please State The Nature of the Medical Emergency
requiredMoves.description: When you attempt to treat a medical condition or injury, roll +Peace. On a 10+, choose three. On a 7-9, choose two.
holds: You are able to repair injury and remove 1 Harm.
You are able to correct a temporary debility.
You make progress or discover something new about an ongoing medical issue.
The procedure is without any complications.

optionalMoves.description: You may roll +Peace instead of +Rank when using Issue Orders, regardless of Rank or other circumstances, if the orders relate to a medical situation.
When you Perform a Scan on a living creature, on a hit, you hold this question for free: “What is interesting about this creature’s biology?”
When you Open Fire against other creature by using a medical instrument, you may roll +Peace instead of +War. If you do, you may not choose to inflict terrible harm.
May only be taken as an advancement. You are +1 Rank (maximum +3).
